name: test
description:
Runs unit tests in a project.

运行某个项目中的单元测试。
longDescription:
Takes the name of the project, as specified in the `projects` section of the `angular.json` workspace configuration file.
When a project name is not supplied, it will execute for all projects.

获取在工作空间配置文件 `angular.json` 的 `projects` 部分指定的项目名称。如果未提供项目名称，它将对所有项目执行。

options.name: project
options.description:
The name of the project to build. Can be an application or a library.

要构建的项目名。可以是应用或库。

options.name: configuration
options.description:
One or more named builder configurations as a comma-separated list as specified in the "configurations" section of angular.json.
The builder uses the named configurations to run the given target.
For more information, see https://angular.io/guide/workspace-config#alternate-build-configurations.
Setting this explicitly overrides the "--prod" flag.

构建器的一个或多个命名配置，是一个逗号分隔的列表，就像在 angular.json 的 "configurations" 部分指定的一样。
构建器使用这些命名配置运行给定的目标。
欲知详情，参见 https://angular.cn/guide/workspace-config#alternate-build-configurations。
可以通过显式指定 "--prod" 标志来覆盖它。

options.name: prod
options.description:
Shorthand for "--configuration=production".
Set the build configuration to the production target.
By default, the production target is set up in the workspace configuration such that all builds make use of bundling, limited tree-shaking, and also limited dead code elimination.

"--configuration=production" 的简写形式。
把构建配置的目标设置为产品环境。
默认情况下，产品环境目标是在工作空间配置中设置的，可以设置打包方式、摇树优化限制、死代码移除限制等方面。

options.name: help
options.description:
Shows a help message for this command in the console.

在控制台显示关于本命令的帮助信息。

options.name: main
options.description:
The name of the main entry-point file.

主入口点文件的名称。

options.name: ts-config
options.description:
The name of the TypeScript configuration file.

TypeScript 配置文件的名称。

options.name: karma-config
options.description:
The name of the Karma configuration file.

Karma 配置文件的名称。

options.name: polyfills
options.description:
The name of the polyfills file.

polyfills 文件的名称。

options.name: include
options.description:
Globs of files to include, relative to workspace or project root. 
There are 2 special cases:

要包含的文件的 glob，是相对于工作空间或项目根目录的。
 有两个特例：

 - when a path to directory is provided, all spec files ending ".spec.@(ts|tsx)" will be included

   当提供的是目录路径时，会包含所有以 ".spec.@(ts|tsx)" 结尾的规约文件。

 - when a path to a file is provided, and a matching spec file exists it will be included instead

   当提供的是文件路径并且匹配的规约文件存在时，会包含这些匹配的文件。

options.name: source-map
options.description:
Output source maps for scripts and styles. For more information, see https://angular.io/guide/workspace-config#source-map-configuration.

输出脚本和样式的源码映射信息。欲知详情，请参阅<https://angular.cn/guide/workspace-config#source-map-configuration>。

options.name: progress
options.description:
Log progress to the console while building.

在构建时将进度记录到控制台。

options.name: watch
options.description:
Run build when files change.

当文件更改时运行构建。

options.name: poll
options.description:
Enable and define the file watching poll time period in milliseconds.

启用并定义文件监视轮询间隔（以毫秒为单位）。

options.name: preserve-symlinks
options.description:
Do not use the real path when resolving modules. If unset then will default to `true` if NodeJS option --preserve-symlinks is set.

当解析模块时，不要使用真实路径。如果未设置，则如果 NodeJS 启用了 --preserve-symlinks 选项，就默认为 `true`。

options.name: browsers
options.description:
Override which browsers tests are run against.

覆盖要针对哪些浏览器运行测试。

options.name: code-coverage
options.description:
Output a code coverage report.

输出代码覆盖率报告。

options.name: code-coverage-exclude
options.description:
Globs to exclude from code coverage.

排除在代码覆盖范围之外的 glob。

options.name: reporters
options.description:
Karma reporters to use. Directly passed to the karma runner.

要使用的 Karma 汇报器。直接传给 Karma 运行器。

options.name: web-worker-ts-config
options.description:
TypeScript configuration for Web Worker modules.

Web Worker 模块的 TypeScript 配置。
